name: 深层宝藏 Deep Treasure
description:
This is a 3D third-person dungeon crawling game. Here you can:
· Eat foods.
· Drink potions.
· Read scrolls.
· Equip regular weapons and armors but enchant them.
· Attack monsters.
· Roll, roll far.
· Planting.
· Skill-building.
· Trade with the merchant young girl.
· Barbecue.
· Open chests, but there's nothing inside.
· Open a lot of meaningless doors.
· Have fun or have bored.
